title.rendered: List of Northern Air Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Northern Air operates affordable, reliable, comfortable flights, connecting the world to the stunning Northern Islands of Fiji. With true Bula spirit the fleet of six planes currently service some of Fijis most stunning destinations Suva, Taveuni, Savusavu, Labasa, Levuksa, Moala and Nadi. We also offer a full charter service as well as medivac.

The Northern Airlines family is dedicated to the highest quality of customer service delivered with a sense of warmth, Fijian charm, and individual pride with the “Spirit of the friendly North”.

Verified & Updated on: 19/04/21

Address :Nausori International Airport
Hangar 2, Hangar Rd

Phone : 3475005 / 3475003 / 9958162 / 7732449

AGENTS OF NORTHERNAIR

Gau
Contact number: 7521904

Levuka
Contact number: 7089446

Moala
Contact number: 7209337

Savusavu
Contact number: 8850469

Taveuni
Contact number: 9996220

Email id: northernairfjreservations@gmail.com OR
northernair_reservations@hotmail.com

Opening Hours: Mon to Fri: 7AM – 7PM
Sat, Sun & Public Holiday: 8AM – 5PM

Fax : NA

Northern Air Airlines Official website :https://northernair.com.fj/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Northern Air Airlines 

  • Britten Norman Islander
  • Britten Norman Trilander BN2
  • Embraer Banderaintes

Northern Air Airlines Offices:

Select the airline office from below table to view its contact details

Fiji – Suva
Fiji – Labasa
Fiji – Nadi
Fiji – Savusavu
Fiji – Nausori
Fiji – Labasa

Northern Air Airlines Baggage Allowance

Northern Air Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Northern Air Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Northern Air Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Northern Air Airlines  Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Northern Air Airlines: (click on the stars below)
